name: Eight Otters Software Development
tagline: Building web, mobile and wearable applications in Vancouver, BC
body:
### Welcome
We are a development consultancy based in Vancouver, BC.

### Core specialization
- Web application development: front-end and back-end. Python (Django), Ruby (Rails), Angular, Ember.js
- Mobile development: Android and iOS. Native or Hybrid (cordova, crosswalk).
- Wearables: Pebble, Apple Watch, Tizen
- UX & Design, wireframes, interface design, branding

### Contact
Please get in touch at info@eightotters.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
